titles.title: Federal Cogeneration Act of 1993
To authorize Federal departments and agencies to sell energy from cogeneration facilities, and for other purposes.

term.name: Cogeneration of electric power and heat

bill.summary: 10/26/1993--Introduced. Federal Cogeneration Act of 1993 - Authorizes any Federal department or agency using energy for heating, cooling, manufacturing, or processing operations to enter into contracts for the provision and operation of cogeneration facilities and for the purchase of energy from those facilities. Authorizes such contracts to permit the cogeneration facility owner or operator to sell electric energy to any public or private electric utility company.
